means: 研究[收藏，出售]古物的人

sentence.Network_en: I am afraid the myth was invented in 1754 by the English antiquary William Stukeley.
sentence.Network_cn: 我恐怕这个神话是由英国古董商威廉-斯图克利在1754年发明的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... antiquark 反夸克 antiquary 古文物研究者 antiquate 使古旧.
英语单词词根记忆大全txt_百度文库 ... antic a. 古怪的,笨拙的? antiquary n. 古物研究者,古董商人 antiquate vt. 使古旧,废弃.
molten 熔铸的，熔化antiquary古文物研究者，收集者，古董商人ancient 远古的，旧的
vocabulary ... antimony-giessenite 锑－针辉铋铅矿 antiquary 古物收藏者，古董商 antique enamel 古代珐琅，古代瓷釉.

list.abs: The best antiquaries have now confuted Homer ., 最好的考古学者已经将荷马驳倒了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin antiquarius, from antiquus (see antique)

entry.tran: 古文物收藏家;古文物研究者;古文物经营者
entry.def: An antiquary is a person who studies the past, or who collects or buys and sells old and valuable objects.

means.word_mean: 1. an expert or collector of antiquities
